This is @frankthorpv. The pictures in this post were taken with a purple-tinted film made by @Lomography, which gives the images an old-style feel.
.
During such a historic time in American #politics, I love the idea of capturing these present-day moments but having them look like they were taken decades ago.
.
They were taken while covering #Congress as a producer/reporter for @NBCNews, using a medium format #filmcamera borrowed from @NBCNews justice correspondent Pete Williams, who is an avid and amazing #photographer himself.
.
I‚Äôve been shooting #film for just over a year, and Capitol Hill is a particularly photogenic place to shoot. It‚Äôs also filled with some of the best #news #photographers in the world, who have been amazingly helpful and encouraging with their tips about how to shoot film in the digital age.
.
In the age of cell phone #cameras and social media, I like slowing things down, trying different, older cameras, and going through the whole process, from shooting to developing to #printing in the #darkroom.
.
I hope you enjoy them as much as I do.

.
